robotrain

Class BattleRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • robocode.control.events.BattleAdaptor
      • robotrain.BattleRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    robocode.control.events.IBattleListener

    public class BattleRunner
extends robocode.control.events.BattleAdaptor
    Author:
    Max Used to run robocode battles maintains an instance of the engine so a new JVM doesn't need to be started for every battle

      • runBattle

        public robocode.BattleResults[] runBattle(boolean visible,
                                 java.lang.String robotNames,
                                 int numRounds)
        Run a robocode battle
        Parameters:
        visible - Toggle for robocode visibility
        robotNames - The robocode robots in the battle (eg. "sample.MyFirstRobot,sample.RamFire")
        numRounds - Number of rounds in a battle
